concept.title: 249.109-70 LIMITATION ON PRICING OF THE TERMINATED EFFORT.

conbody.p: When there is a termination for convenience (partial or whole) or a change that reduces scope, follow the procedures at PGI 249.109-70 for limitation on pricing of the terminated or reduced effort.
